description:
Welcome to ‘Deal A Meal,' the Diet & Exercise Application brought to you by JTR Softworks. 

Using our special meal randomizing technology, ‘Deal A Meal’ searches through hundreds of easy recipes to make a combination that is perfect for your specific needs. Whether you’re on a special diet or trying to come up with fun meal ideas for yourself and your family, ‘Deal A Meal’ has got a meal just for you!

Vegetarian and Vegan friendly!

Each meal comes with nutritional information such as calories, protein, fat, and carbs to help you keep a balanced and healthy diet. Most main courses also come with links to Recipes.

A shopping list is included so when you go shopping you'll know all of the ingredients you need!

Also includes a list of common activities and exercises to enter into a calorie burning calculator that lets you know how much calories your burn for each day, so you can keep track of how many calories your burn.

Many more updates to come!
